attributes.action: We the public want to vote on no deal or take the deal
attributes.additional_details: Parliament cannot agree on anything there for it is upto us the tax paying public to take control and do it for them no deal needs to be put to us as does a deal
attributes.background: if it comes back that the public decide no deal then the prime minister must step aside and let a brexitier take over to carry out what the people voted for may I remind all the people in parliament we the public put you there to do a job so do it or stand down

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions calling for someone to be given or lose their job. This would be a personal decision for the Prime Minister.

In any case, we can't accept your petition as there’s already a petition about this issue. We cannot accept a new petition when we already have one about a very similar issue.

You are more likely to get action on this issue if you sign and share a single petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/232882
